rooms.description: A welcoming entry with a foyer that incorporates local materials and minimalistic Scandinavian design. Vastu-compliant placement of entrance.
An open-plan space combining living area with dining space, featuring natural light, large windows on the eastern side to capture morning energy. Minimalistic decor and functional furniture.

Modern, open-plan kitchen with Scandinavian design principles. Includes an island, storage units, and energy-efficient appliances. Consider placement for Vastu (eastern wall recommended for entrance to kitchen).
Spacious master bedroom featuring minimal decor with functional storage and a serene ambience. Vastu-compliant layout ensuring the bed faces north-east.
Private bathroom attached to master bedroom with Scandinavian fixtures and ample storage. Ensures privacy with Vastu guidelines regarding water elements.

openings.description: Large front door ensuring a welcoming entry as per local building norms.
Larger windows on east and south walls to enhance natural lighting, aligned with Vastu principles for optimal energy flow.
Access door leading to a small balcony overlooking the garden area.
